title: Riot 10 Years Gift
body:
Okay So... When i saw riot giving kayle skin and new icon for each person ingame,i started check everyday if i got it,everyone which is on my friend list got the skin and the icon,my friends inreall life got it too... but i didnt got it. if i didnt got it till today there is no chance ill get it on the 23 so that's the reason im typing this to you,Riot,do something with it, if ill not get it i want to Receive a refund for the Aggravation and the time that i I kept waiting for....
Riot this is for u.
Read it
Thx

replies.body: Just wondering why am I guaranteed one of my roles

We're still working at getting these gifts out. Sit tight while we wrap up the gifting process (no pun intended).

Let me know if you're still missing it by tomorrow, the 23rd.

Hey, i didnt got it yet.. ):
i waited really long time,all my friends got it im the only one which not having it.
if you can (i belive riot can) i want a refund or something more....

We're still sending gifts out, as the deadline has been pushed to the 30th. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hey. okay i will,if ill not get it till the 30th can i get refund? something bigger?.
Thx
The gifts go out in waves and if you haven't gotten them by 9/23 you should send in a support ticket.
